SEARCH
Package KI304.Pavlosiuk.Lab2

Class Phone

java.lang.Object
KI304.Pavlosiuk.Lab2.Phone
public class Phone extends Object
This class represents a Phone with integrated functionality for calls, smart features, and media controls. It logs various actions to a file named "Log.txt".
Since:
version 1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Vitalii_Pavlosiuk

  • Field Details

    • isEnabled

      public boolean isEnabled

  • Constructor Details

    • Phone

      public Phone() throws FileNotFoundException
      Constructor Initializes a Phone object with default Call, Smart, and Media instances. Creates a PrintWriter to log actions to the "Log.txt" file.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - If the "Log.txt" file cannot be created.

    • Phone

      public Phone(String pN, boolean callStatus, int callDuration, boolean wifiStatus, boolean bluetoothStatus, int volume, int screenBrightness) throws FileNotFoundException
      Constructor with parameters for initializing the Phone object. Initializes a Phone object with specified parameters. Creates a PrintWriter to log actions to the "Log.txt" file.
      Parameters:
      pN - Phone number
      wifiStatus - Initial WiFi status
      volume - Initial volume level
      screenBrightness - Initial screen brightness level
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException

  • Method Details

      public void turnOn()
      Turns on the phone and logs the action.

      Turns off the phone and logs the action.

      public void makeCall(String pN)
      Initiates a call, logs the action, ends the call, and logs the call duration.
      Parameters:
      pN - Phone number to call

    • openApp

      public void openApp(int app)
      Opens an app on the Smart device and logs the action.
      Parameters:
      app - Index of the app to open
